alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:14PM CDT until July 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GARDEN AND SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 614 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellsworth, or 34 miles east of Alliance, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Finnegan Lake, Bingham, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake and Wild Horse Flats. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 116 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
